data.title: ROBERT MILO ANDRUS
data.text:
Robert Andrus was born and raised in Utah. Robert is an actor, producer, and casting associate. After years of living in Los Angeles, Robert returned to Utah, producing a collection of award-winning educational videos and several feature films including The Adventures of Chris Fable and Treasure State and upcoming release of, The Forlorned.

As an actor, Robert has many projects in all phases of production. He has recently worked opposite John David Washington, Mia Maestro, Victor Rasuk, Clayne Crawford, John Carroll Lynch, Don Johnson, Rebecca Rittenhouse, India de Beaufort, and Lolita Davidovich.

Robert is the Casting Associate for Jeff Johnson Casting, Utah’s premiere casting office. Robert has since worked on castings for Directors including Steven Soderbergh, Taylor Sheridan, Rob Reiner and Robert DuVall. He has also been the Utah casting associate for current Yellowstone, Youth & Consequences, Disney’s Andi Mack, High School Musical 2, High School Musical 3, and Cloud 9. He has also done castings for countless commercials and movies starring the likes of Robert DuVall, Sharon Stone, Cary Elwes, Ian McShane, John Leguizamo, Sheryl Lee, Danny Glover, Katherine Heigl, Sam Rockwell and many more.

Robert also volunteer’s annually at the Sundance Institute Directors labs. He as participated as an actor for many years and casting department for three consecutive years, working with creative advisors such as Octavia Spencer, Ed Harris, Catherine Hardwick, Ken Kwapis, Stephen Goldblatt, and Chiwetel Ejiofor.
